params._allocation: - The RewardAllocation struct data to create

params._allocationId: - The id for the reward allocation
params._bidId: - The id for the loan. Each loan only grants one reward per allocation.

params._tokenAmount: - The amount of tokens to withdraw
- The amount of tokens to add

params._bidStartTimeMax: - The block timestamp that loans must have been accepted before to claim rewards
params._bidStartTimeMin: - The block timestamp that loans must have been accepted after to claim rewards
params._rewardPerLoanPrincipalAmount: - The reward to give per principal amount

allocateRewards((address,address,uint256.notice: Creates a new token allocation and transfers the token amount into escrow in this contract

claimRewards(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows a borrower or lender to withdraw the allocated ERC20 reward for their loan

deallocateRewards(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows the allocator to withdraw some or all of the funds within an allocation

increaseAllocationAmount(uint256,uint256.notice: Allows anyone to add tokens to an allocation

updateAllocation(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Allows the allocator to update properties of an allocation
